name: Redwall :: The Warrior Reborn
blurb: The Warrior Reborn \u2013 The first officially licensed game set in the Brian Jacques\u2019 beloved world of Redwall. AbbeyCraft and beyond...

rewards.reward: No Reward

Barely a thistle in your purse, but want to help the cause? At $1, you'll still be a powerful part of bringing something genuinely epic to life. Redwall lives and breathes as the collected efforts of ALL creatures, great and small, and many hands make light work.\r\nYou'll have our deep gratitude plus you'll get the exclusive backer updates throughout the campaign and production.\r\nHelp us make some history...please.
Download AbbeyCraft - The official Redwall Minecraft Adventure
The Music of Redwall - Early Adopter\r\n\u2022 Download of the Redwall Minecraft Adventure\r\n\u2022 Download the full original soundtrack as MP3s.
The Music of Redwall\r\n\u2022 Download of the Redwall Minecraft Adventure\r\n\u2022 Download the full original soundtrack as MP3s.

The Beauty of Redwall - Early Adopter:\r\nAll the above plus...\r\n\u2022 Page after beautiful page of the collected concept and game art used in the creation of the game. Download a PDF of this unique collection.
The Beauty of Redwall:\r\nAll the above plus...\r\n\u2022 Page after beautiful page of the collected concept and game art used in the creation of the game.  Download a PDF of this unique collection.

The Redwall Insider (updated): All the above plus... 
• Special "backer only" access to the AbbeyCraft Server. 
• Special "backer only" access to the secret developers forum where we'll discuss and post regularly during the game development process.

 This reward is the 'no brainer' option for the committed Redwall fan who wants to be in on all that's happening with the Official Redwall game.

The Redwall Insider:
All the above plus...
• Special access to the secret developers forum where we'll discuss and post regularly during the game development process.
This reward is the 'no brainer' option for the committed Redwall fan who wants to be in on all that's happening with the Official Redwall game.

The Look of Redwall:
All the above plus...
• A special Redwall character skin for use in AbbeyCraft and elsewhere
• A custom texture pack for use in AbbeyCraft and elsewhere.

Redwall Loves Steve:
All the above plus...
• VIP credentials in the Redwall Minecraft Server  - AbbeyCraft (queue priority, additional gear)
• A special Redwall character skin for use in AbbeyCraft and elsewhere • A custom texture pack for use in AbbeyCraft and elsewhere.

Redwall Puzzle Master:
All the items from $50 level plus...
• Your name in the final game credits.
• An invitation to attend the launch feast (below)*.
• Participate in the design process for one or more in-game puzzles.

* Regalers will be responsible for their own travel and lodging.

Redwall Illuminator:
All the items from $50 level plus...
• Your name in the credits.
• An invitation to attend the launch feast (below)*.
• An opportunity to participate in the creation of art assets, concept art and/or marketing art.

* Regalers will be responsible for their own travel and lodging.

Redwall Architect:
All the items from $50 level plus...

* Regalers will be responsible for their own travel and lodging.
